comment: Example for a defined iota being the empty set, i.e., ` A. y x C_ y ` is a wff satisfied by a unique value ` x ` , namely ` x = (/) ` (the empty set is the one and only set which is a subset of every set). (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2022.)
